questions.quote: She had an itch. She could have used any one of those fingers. That finger was meant for me.
Ah, this is great. Alright, well, where is the mechanic? I'll just go and pick 'em up myself.
Yeah. He's really got a good thing with her. In fact I'm doubling with them tonight.
Yeah, think. Don't you remember you kept begging me to see it then finally I agreed. You were supposed to return it. I met you in the gym locker room.
Well then what are all those ties and sport jackets doing in my closet?
Hello?...yeah, I can be there in 10 minutes...you can count on me!
You know, I really like those new jeans Jerry was wearing. He's really thin.
It's like the manager coming out and asking you for the ball.
Oh you know what happened. Some guy from the Post Office confiscated them. He left his card.
I don't know what to believe! You're eating unions, you're spotting dimes, I don't know what the hell is going on.
